Pre-Installation

Flash USB

This section is incomplete and needs further work!

1. Make sure the USB filesystem is not mounted!!!

2. Prepare the USB: 

# cfdisk -z <DEVICE>
cfdisk> gpt
cfdisk> n
cfdisk>  (Enter)
cfdisk> W
cfdisk> yes
cfdisk> Q
# wipefs -a

3. Flash disk image on the USB: 

# dd if=~/openbsd/install<VERSION>.iso of=<DEVICE> bs=1M

USB Boot

1. Reboot the system and during the POST phase press BIOS key1) to boot into UEFI.

2. Disable Secure Boot and reboot.

3. On the next POST phase, press Boot Menu key2) and select USB entry.

1) , 2)
List of POST keys according to vendor: http://www.disk-image.com/faq-bootmenu.htm.
